title: Astragalin alleviates oligoasthenospermia via promoting nuclear translocation of Nrf2 and reducing ferroptosis of testis
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Jiayu Cai, Lingxiong Song, Zebo Hu, Xiaojiao Gao, Yuhan Wang, Yang Chen, Ke Xi, Xin Lu, Yonghui Shi
